name: Endless Odyssey
description:
In this game you will be following the characters mission home from their journey. You will encounter many threats so be prepared. 

Your objective is to make it from one magical tent to another which will teleport you through the levels.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created for a game jam with the theme "an end is a new beginning" I made it link to the theme by having the character coming home from an adventure and the end of his adventure was a new beginning. I was planning on adding cutscenes and other things to link it to the theme more but I didn't have the time. So hopefully this is enough.

I hope you enjoy!
